Office: 701-647-2303
Fax: 701-647-2304
If you cannot fully access the information on any web page of this site, please let us know the accessibility issue you are having by contacting Geri Kinzler, Business Manager at (701) 647-2303 or by e-mail at geri.kinzler@k12.nd.us. We will try to provide the information to you in an alternate format and/or make the necessary improvements to make the information accessible. If you would like to file a formal grievance under Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act, you may contact our Section 504 coordinator, Amy Johnson, K-12 Principal, at Kulm Public School, 217 2nd Ave. SE, Kulm, ND, (701) 647-2303 or by e-mail at amy.johnson@k12.nd.us.
